comments:
Latest HEAD of CDT + latest HEAD of Eclipse yields the following exception when you try to 
open a C++ editor. If you guys are trying to stay on top of the latest Eclipse changes, this might be 
worth looking into.

On second thought, this looks more like a problem with Eclipse than with CDT.
*** Bug 57132 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
This bug can be worked-around by simply adding the appropriate null check.
*** Bug 57367 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
